title: Part 2
subtitle: Hanumān leaves for Laṅkā, meets Surasa and kills the image-catching demoness

title: Part 3
subtitle: Description of Laṅkā; Hanumān strikes Laṅkinī and enters Laṅkā

title: Part 5
subtitle: Hanumān's grief at the sight of Sītā in the Aśoka grove and Rāvaṇa's threat to Sītā

title: Part 8
subtitle: Hanumān lays waste the Aśoka grove and kills prince Aksaya; at last Meghanāda entangles Hanumān in a noose of serpents and carries him off to Rāvaṇa's court

title: Part 11
subtitle: After burning Laṅkā Hanumān asks leave of Sītā and obtains the crest-jewel from Her

title: Part 12
subtitle: On Hanumān's reaching the opposite shore all the monkeys return and enter Madhuvana; their meeting with Sugrīva and the dialogue between Śrī Rāma and Hanumān

title: Part 13
subtitle: Śrī Rāma's march to the beach alongwith the army of monkeys

title: Part 15
subtitle: Vibhīṣaṇa offers advice to Rāvaṇa and meets with an affront at the latter's hands

title: Part 16
subtitle: Vibhīṣaṇa sallies forth to obtain Śrī Rāma's protection and secures it

title: Part 17
subtitle: Deliberation over the question of crossing the sea; appearance of Śuka, a spy of Rāvaṇa, and his return with Lakṣmaṇa's letter

title: Part 18
subtitle: The spy gives counsel to Rāvaṇa and delivers Lakṣmaṇa's note to him

title: Part 19
subtitle: Śrī Rāma's fury against the sea and the latter's supplication
